titleStmt.title: Souvenir Program of Women's Day Activities. June 23, 1957.
titleStmt.author: Unknown

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: A souvenir program for the Women's Day activities held at Bethel Baptist Institutional Church in 1957.

objectDesc.p: A typed program folded into 11 pages with the outer pages being a red sheet of paper different from the rest of the program.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

Mrs. Magdaline Peters

On the occasion of this our Woman's Day We Pause momentarily in retrospection.
Our Spirit is not one of exaltation, but a spirit of gratitide and high hope.

As we become more nearly unamiousunanimousin our pursuit of the knowledge of God, may we
strive to be doers of the Word. thenThen we shall find our joys becoming fuller.

div.head: Columbia, S. C.South Carolina A. B., M. A., Instructor, Benedict College

joyful noise to the Rock of our Salvation, For the
Lord is a great God, and a great King. Above
all Gods," Psalm 95: 1-3.
